This film is set during World War II and revolves around a law student who becomes a lieutenant, gets captured, and defends an African American prisoner of war falsely accused of murder.

Another movie that might interest you is "A Farewell to Arms" starring Gary Cooper and Helen Hayes. This classic film follows the love story of an English nurse and an American ambulance driver during World War 1, a tale that beautifully portrays the challenges faced by their romantic relationship in the midst of war.

Alternatively, if you're looking for a more spiritual and introspective story, "The Way Back Home" might be a great choice. This film follows Spencer Krane as he returns home to face the challenges of life and find his place in the world. Ruby Dee delivers a touching performance in this beautiful drama.
